reviewText:
Puts the perspective of dropping of the first atomic bomb, into the view point of the common people of Hiroshima on that day.  The sickness, death and destruction of the atomic blast is to some degree, brought into the open and makes the viewer think, what if it was me, there on that day.

Video quality was poor and played like it was a very old VHS tape.  Would be very good, if it was on DVD.
